page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT_SCHOOL 2
page.content: Mrs. Smith is the school{secretary. She types letters,collects dinner money and tickets and answers the telephone. Mr. Hirst is the{janitor.}He keeps the school and playground tidy. He gives first aid to children who hurt themselves. He makes sure the boilers work in winter to keep us warm. Mrs. Dey, Mrs. Riddoch, Mrs. Howard and Mrs. Thom are the school{cleaners. They clean the rooms before and after school. Mrs. Grant, Mrs. Donaldson, Mrs. Speed and Mrs, Kinloch are the{kitchen {staff.}They prepare and serve our meals and wash the dishes, pots and pans. Of course, the hardest workers in our school are the 280 children !!!
